user_name.description: The user-name for authenticating into the Libre Hardware Monitor webAPI. This is required if authentication has been enabled on the Libre Hardware Monitor webAPI.

password.description: The password for authenticating into the Libre Hardware Monitor webAPI. This is required if authentication has been enabled on the Libre Hardware Monitor webAPI.

host.description: The host for the Libre Hardware Monitor webAPI.

port.description: The port for the Libre Hardware Monitor webAPI.

executable_path.description: The path to the OpenHardwareMonitor executable.

auto_start.description: Whether or not to automatically start the OpenHardwareMonitor executable.
